#include <iostream>

using namespace std;

int main()
{
	
	int t;
	int n;
	int i, j, k, flag;
	long int arr[100000], ans;
	long long int left[100000], right[100000], sum;
	scanf("%d", &t);
	
	while(t--) {
		
		scanf("%d", &n);
		flag = 0;
		for(i = 0; i < n; i++) {
			scanf("%ld", &arr[i]);
		}
		
		k = 0;
		sum = 0;
		for(i = 0; i < n; i++) {
			
			sum = arr[k] + sum;
			left[i] = sum;
			k++;
		}
		
		k = n - 1;
		sum = 0;
		for(i = n - 1; i >= 0; i--) {
			
			sum = arr[k] + sum;
			right[i] = sum;
			k--;
		}
		
		
		i = 0;
		j = n - 1;
		
		while(i < n - 1 && j > 0) {
			
			//cout << "l = " << left[i] << " r = " << right[j] << endl;
			
			if(left[i] < right[j]) {
				i++;
			} else if(left[i] > right[j]) {
				j--;
			} else if(left[i] == right[j]) {
				if((j - i) == -2 || (j - i) == 2) {
					
					flag = 1;
					break;
				}
			}
			
		}
		
		if(flag == 1) {
			cout << arr[i + 1] << endl;
		} else {
			cout << "NO EQUILIBRIUM" << endl;
		}
		
		
	}
	
	return 0;
	
}
